products.name: Ultra Light Down Relaxed Coat
products.smalldes: Padded with high loft batting - Durable water-repellent coating - Pocketable design.
products.description:
- Soft, lightweight 10-denier fabric.
- Anti-static lining.
-750+ Fill Power* high quality down. *by DFB Measurement method
-No down pack for Ultra Light Weight.
-Pocketable design. Including its own carrying bag.
- Large diamond quilting pattern for a casual look.
- Thicker, softer, fluffier down.
- Updated collar for easy layering.
- Streamlined side seam pockets make layering easier.
- Quilted look goes with casual styles.
- Wear as an inner or outer down layer.

products.name: Ultralight Down Vest
products.smalldes: Padded with high loft batting - Durable water-repellent coating - Pocketable design.
products.description:
The fabric and cut have been modified to create a more versatile style for everyday wear.
- A more matte texture, perfect for creating informal looks.
- Durable water resistant coating.
- Pocket design.
- Antistatic lining.
- The new cropped boxy silhouette goes great with high-waisted skirts and pants.
- Perfect for playing sports or everyday.
- You can wear it under other outerwear to provide extra warmth and color.

products.name: Extra Fine Merino Crew Neck Long-Sleeve Sweater

products.name: Premium Lambswool Ribbed Cardigan
products.smalldes: Padded with high loft batting - Durable water-repellent coating - Pocketable design.
products.description:
The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.

- Cardigan rib knit made with soft 100% premium wool.
- Slightly cropped length and a relaxed fit.
- Features a ribbed hem and cuffs, and a full needle stitched placket that highlights the V-neck line.
- Distinctive saddle shoulder design.
- Lightweight yet warm.
- Incredibly soft and comfortable.
- Great for wearing on its own or layering

products.name: 3D Knit Cashmere Crew Neck Long-Sleeve Sweater
products.smalldes: Padded with high loft batting - Durable water-repellent coating - Pocketable design.
products.description:
Made of 100% cashmere, known as the jewel of fabrics, which is light, warm, and smooth to the touch.
- The yarn count is adjusted for the WHOLEGARMENT machine, and the tight knit creates a durable feel.
- Thanks to pilling-resistant processing, it can be hand-washed and lasts longer. *We recommend drying this sweater flat after washing and folding it when storing.
- A basic sweater that fits all body types, knit in a unique WHOLEGARMENT centripetal pattern. *WHOLEGARMENT is a registered trademark of the SHIMA SEIKI Corporation.
- Sleek look despite the relaxed fit.
- The cuffs, hem, and neck line are made with a special threading technique to prevent stretching and create a durable construction.- Coordinates with many outfits for a variety of occasions.

products.name: Wool Blend Long Coat
